resources.string: 请您把机器初始化后重新注册机器
装置控制失败，请重新确认终端状况。
选择机器， 变更机器名称
此设备不提供详细指南
您确定要删除所选设备吗？ 删除后，您需要连接设备。
① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button and a "Beep" beep will sound for 4 seconds.\nWait 5 to 10 seconds and your device will be registered.
① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button and a "Beep" beep will sound for 4 seconds.\nWait 5 to 10 seconds and your device will be registered.

① If you attach the first battery or press the Pairing button, the red LED will blink for 30 seconds, and it will be in Pairing standby state.\n② Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile phone and wait for 5 ~ 10 seconds.\n③ When the pairing is completed, the green LED will blink and the unit will be registered.

① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② When you press the Pairing button in the initial state, the yellow LED flashes 1 or 2 times. Wait 5 to 10 seconds and your device will be registered.

① Make the gas valve breaker closed.
② Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.
③ If you press the Pairing button more than 5 seconds, "P" flickers on the LCD. At this time, release the button and press the valve switch to open it.
④ When connected, the antenna icon appears. Wait 15 ~ 25 seconds and the device will be registered.
① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button and the green LED will blink 1 or 2 times. Wait 5 to 10 seconds and your device will be registered.

① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the red LED will blink for 30 seconds.\n③ When the device registration is completed, the red LED turns off when it is completed.

① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and hold the Pairing button, the LED will blink.\n③ After releasing the Pairing button, wait 5 ~ 10 seconds and the machine will be registered.

① Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the red LED will blink for 30 seconds.\n③ When the device registration is completed, the red LED turns off when it is completed.
Please press the connection button of the device.\nIt may take up to one minute, depending on network conditions. If the connection is not smooth, please try again.
Device not connected. Try one more time
